|flags = high-gain antennas, DFS, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 11/05/2014 |estreldate = 05/01/2015 |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = 9SIA25V3K03123 |asin = B00TQD235C |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "1311182'''T4UH-1.0'''", "Rev:1.0sp3", "CA-F121" and "1348" :is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/TE7T4UH/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-2436624 FCC photos]. *Two high-gain external antennas :802.11n 2.4GHz 2T2R (300Mbps) :802.11ac 5GHz 2T2R (867Mbps) :USB 3.0 port, OEM: [[Proware]] {{See also|TP-LINK Archer T series|TP-LINK}} ==Notes== ===Driver=== *[https://github.com/abperiasamy/rtl8812AU_8821AU_linux/blob/master/os_dep/linux/usb_intf.c ''rtl8812AU_8821AU_linux driver'' on '''abperiasamy''']
